elements: Goodbye My Lover piano - full prominence
Goodbye My Lover vocals - intimate, close-mic feel
Subtle high-pass filtered Mr. Brightside bass - barely audible
Mr. Brightside bass line - low-pass filtered, sidechained to ballad rhythm
Creating underlying urgency and tension buildup
Mr. Brightside guitar riff enters as melodic answer
Gradual filter sweeps opening up Mr. Brightside elements
Key tension: brief moments in C# before resolving to C
Full Mr. Brightside drum pattern enters
Both vocal melodies layer - Blunt lead, Killers harmonizing
Lyrical motifs sampled and looped between songs
Gradual outro returning to intimate piano

vocal_treatment.secondary_vocal: The Killers - filtered, used as texture and harmony

mixing_approach.stereo_imaging: Piano center-left, guitar center-right, vocals center

creative_elements.lyrical_interweaving: Sample and layer complementary emotional phrases
creative_elements.narrative_arc: Nostalgic intimacy evolving into invigorating celebration
